name: NumberGame
0:
”Alexa open number game”
”Alexa play number game”
”Alexa launch number game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: number game
des:
A game for kids who can count to 10 and want to improve their understanding of numbers. In 10 rounds, Alexa asks which of two numbers is bigger. Test if your child is interested by the questions: ‚Which number is bigger, five or seven?’ If your child asks for more questions, leave it to Alexa.
 
Attention: Alexa only understands a clear pronunciation of the numbers. Stay with your child for the first few attempts during the game to avoid any disappointment if Alexa doesn’t understand what they are saying.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
